Name: Aetherstorm
Description: The Quintessence's Raging Storm deals divine damage, and its allies are immune to its effects. In addition, when any character starts its turn in the area, the Quintessent can apply one of following effects.

ExtraItems.Name: Earth
ExtraItems.Description: Create a pit under the character.

ExtraItems.Name: Fire
ExtraItems.Description: Character deals 2 piercing damage to all adjacent foes.

ExtraItems.Name: Water
ExtraItems.Description: End a mark, blight, or condition on the character.

Name: Crystal Perfection
Description: This Jotunn can use the average of its damage die (6) instead of rolling for damage.

Name: Cursed Cauldron
Description: Foes do not save against conditions at the end of their turn while in the aura of the cauldron.

Name: Exalt Erenhelion
Description: At the start of the Round, the Aetnir either chooses Crush Cowards or Break the Mighty. At the end of the round, the chosen effect occurs.

ExtraItems.Name: Crush Cowards
ExtraItems.Description: The Aetnir raises its weapon. At the end of the round, it sweeps out with a massive slash, affecting a blast 3 area effect around it, with different effects depending on how close characters are. Foes 3 spaces away take 2[D]+[fray]. Foes 2 spaces away take [D]+[fray]. Adjacent foes take [fray] damage.

ExtraItems.Name: Break the Mighty
ExtraItems.Description: The Aetnir raises its shield. At the end of the round, it slams its shield down. Adjacent characters take 2[D]+[fray] and are shoved 2 spaces away. Collide: Characters take [D]+[fray] again and are stunned.

Name: Living Deeps
Description: Instead of a 2x2 space, this Jotunn occupies an Arc 4 space that can be placed in any configuration. When it moves, move either end space of the Arc, then re-place the Arc in any valid configuration. It can make attacks or use abilities from any of its spaces.

Name: Primal Aether
Description: This character's abilities do not trigger interrupts or activate effects from its foes.

Name: Rune of Warding
Description: Aura 2. Foes that enter the aura take 2 piercing damage. They can only take this damage once round.

Name: Scouring Gaze
Description: At the start of the round, the Cyclopean chooses a blast 1 area in range 6. At the end of the round, they shoot a massive bolt of energy at that area, dealing [D]+fray piercing damage as an area effect to characters within. If the Cyclopean is blinded, characters within take only 1 damage instead.

Name: Titan Armament
Description: This Jotunn is armed with Titansteel weaponry. They can take 1 extra turn a round, and 1/round may dash 2 as a free action, then deal [fray] damage to all adjacent foes.

Name: Thinblood
Description: Size 1, and doesn't have the elite trait like other Jotunn.

Name: Titanblood
Description: Increase size to 2 if not already 2. (This character takes up a 2 by 2 area of spaces)

Name: Titanfall
Description: When defeated, roll 1d6 and assign a compass direction (1-None, 2- N, 3-E, 4-S, 5-W, 6-GM choice). The Jotunn falls into a close blast 1 area to its space. Size 1 characters inside must save or take 6 damage, or 3 on a successful save. Move all characters out of the area into the closest available space and place the defeated Jotunn there. They count as a 2x2 space of height 1 terrain while defeated.

Name: True Titanblood
Description: Gain resistance at 25% max hp or lower.

Name: Whirlgang
Description: At the start of its turn, the Mistral and all allies in range 2 may fly 1 in the same direction.
